scripts.dev:chrome: cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=chrome VITE_BUILD_TARGET=main vite build --watch --mode development
scripts.dev:firefox: cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=firefox VITE_BUILD_TARGET=main vite build --watch --mode development
scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.build:chrome: cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=chrome VITE_BUILD_TARGET=main vite build && cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=chrome VITE_BUILD_TARGET=content vite build
scripts.build:firefox: cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=firefox VITE_BUILD_TARGET=main vite build && cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=firefox VITE_BUILD_TARGET=content vite build
